framework.name: NIST Cybersecurity Framework
framework.description: Risk-based framework for governing, identifying, protecting, detecting, responding to, and recovering from cybersecurity events.

domains.name: Govern
domains.description: Set direction, oversight, and accountability for cybersecurity.

domains.name: Identify
domains.description: Understand assets, business context, and risks.

domains.name: Protect
domains.description: Implement safeguards to protect services and data.

domains.name: Detect
domains.description: Identify anomalous events and potential incidents.

domains.name: Recover
domains.description: Restore services and learn from incidents.

controls.title: Cybersecurity governance defined
controls.summary_description: Establish leadership ownership, policy direction, and accountability for cybersecurity outcomes.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define a governance charter, assign accountable owners, and review program objectives quarterly.

suggested_task_templates.title: Publish cybersecurity governance charter
suggested_task_templates.description: Approve and publish governance roles, responsibilities, and reporting cadence.

suggested_task_templates.title: Quarterly governance review
suggested_task_templates.description: Review program objectives, risks, and KPIs with leadership.

controls.title: Risk strategy established
controls.summary_description: Define risk appetite, tolerance, and decision criteria for cybersecurity.
controls.implementation_guidance: Document risk thresholds and ensure they are referenced in exception and remediation workflows.

suggested_task_templates.title: Document risk appetite
suggested_task_templates.description: Define acceptable residual risk levels and escalation paths.

controls.title: Supply chain oversight
controls.summary_description: Assess and manage third-party risk across vendors and partners.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain vendor inventory, classify critical suppliers, and enforce security requirements in contracts.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review critical vendor security
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate security controls for high-risk vendors.

controls.title: Asset inventory maintained
controls.summary_description: Identify and track business-critical systems, data, and infrastructure assets.
controls.implementation_guidance: Keep a living inventory with owners, classifications, and dependencies.

suggested_task_templates.title: Build asset inventory
suggested_task_templates.description: Document systems, data stores, and owners.

controls.title: Business environment understood
controls.summary_description: Define critical services, customers, and operational dependencies.
controls.implementation_guidance: Map business processes to systems and data that support them.

suggested_task_templates.title: Document critical services
suggested_task_templates.description: Identify services and dependencies required to operate.

controls.title: Risk assessment performed
controls.summary_description: Identify threats, vulnerabilities, and impacts to prioritize remediation.
controls.implementation_guidance: Run periodic risk assessments and track treatment plans.

suggested_task_templates.title: Conduct quarterly risk review
suggested_task_templates.description: Update risk register and treatment status.

controls.title: Access control enforced
controls.summary_description: Ensure access is granted based on role, least privilege, and approval.
controls.implementation_guidance: Apply MFA, role-based access, and regular access reviews.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run access review
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate user access for critical systems.

controls.title: Data protection applied
controls.summary_description: Protect sensitive data through encryption, retention, and handling controls.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use encryption at rest/in transit and enforce retention schedules.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate encryption coverage
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm encryption for critical data stores.

controls.title: Security awareness training
controls.summary_description: Ensure workforce understands security expectations and reporting.
controls.implementation_guidance: Run onboarding training and annual refreshers with tracking.

suggested_task_templates.title: Launch annual security training
suggested_task_templates.description: Schedule and track annual security refresher.

controls.title: Continuous monitoring
controls.summary_description: Monitor systems and logs to detect anomalous activity.
controls.implementation_guidance: Aggregate logs, alert on thresholds, and review alerts weekly.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review security alerts
suggested_task_templates.description: Investigate critical alerts and document outcomes.

controls.title: Anomaly detection
controls.summary_description: Identify unusual behavior that may indicate compromise.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define baseline behavior and tune detection rules.

suggested_task_templates.title: Tune detection rules
suggested_task_templates.description: Adjust anomaly detection rules based on recent findings.

controls.title: Incident response plan
controls.summary_description: Maintain a tested incident response plan with clear roles.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define escalation paths, run tabletop exercises, and update lessons learned.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run incident response tabletop
suggested_task_templates.description: Simulate incident response and capture outcomes.

controls.title: Incident communications
controls.summary_description: Coordinate communications with stakeholders during incidents.
controls.implementation_guidance: Prepare comms templates and approval workflows.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review incident communications plan
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate stakeholder contacts and messaging templates.

controls.title: Recovery planning
controls.summary_description: Maintain recovery objectives and procedures for critical services.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define RTO/RPO targets and verify backup strategies.

suggested_task_templates.title: Test recovery procedures
suggested_task_templates.description: Run recovery test and document results.

controls.title: Post-incident improvements
controls.summary_description: Capture lessons learned and improve response and recovery.

suggested_task_templates.title: Create improvement backlog
suggested_task_templates.description: Track remediation tasks from incident retrospectives.
